TEXT.TITLE: SCI <SCIS> BUYS FORTUNE <FSYS> COMPUTER ASSETS
TEXT.BODY: Fortune Systems Corp and SCI Systems Inc said they signed a letter of intent covering the purchase of Fortune's microcomputer business assets for an unspecified amount of cash. Fortune Systems makes a desktop computer systems. Reuter
